info.author: David Cramer
info.description:
sentry-heroku
=============

A Sentry extension which integrates with Heroku release tracking.

Install
-------

Install the package via ``pip``::

    pip install sentry-heroku

You can now configure release tracking via your project settings.
info.name: sentry-heroku
info.summary: A Sentry extension which integrates Heroku release tracking.
